data.eml:eml: New species of water mites from the Comoros (Acari: Hydrachnidia)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Smit, Harry, Pesic, Vladimir, Mary-Sasal, Nathalie (2009): New species of water mites from the Comoros (Acari: Hydrachnidia). Zootaxa 2213: 47-56, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.189900
